name: ECHO: The Dragon Watches
description: ECHO: A text adventure is a medieval game made in Twine. Still in VERY early  development, but it is still playable. I have not tested the game on mobile devices but it should work. There are also some Easter eggs! Leave a comment on the game if you found one! Also if you would like to try making your own text adventure game you can download Twine Here or use it online Here! There are also some funny elements.
